name: Space Tanks Spring2022
description:
This game demo is inspired by Asteroids and Wii Tanks. Shoot enemy tanks as they roll across your screen and defend your battlefield! It was made in a week as a part of my Game Design Workshop class (Spring 2022).

Game Description:

Space Tanks is an Asteroids inspired game about defeating enemy tanks that roam across the screen. You can’t leave the battlefield, so dodge the enemies and shoot them down!

Controls:

    W/S - Move tank forward or backwards.

    A/D - Rotate tank left or right.

    Space - Fire a bullet! (Your tank is from the future, and therefore has no cooldown on firing shots!)

Cool Features:

  • Amazing 3D Modeled tanks using Unity!
  • Extremely realistic sound design. There is no sound in space!
  • Glorious futuristic technological improvements that allow the physically impossible to happen! (In space!) This is DEFINITELY not a cop out for any incomplete features in the game, I promise.
